de.affect.manage.event

Class EmotionMaintenanceEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • de.affect.manage.event.EmotionMaintenanceEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class EmotionMaintenanceEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
    This class represents an event triggered by a change in the agent's emotions by the user.
    Author:
    Patrick Gebhard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • EmotionMaintenanceEvent

        public EmotionMaintenanceEvent(java.lang.Object source,
                       java.lang.String name,
                       EmotionType type,
                       double intensity)
        Constructs an event fired by a change in the specified emotions.
        Parameters:
        source - the object that generated this event
        name - the name of the character to which the emotion change event is related
        type - the type of emotion
        intensity - the emotion's intensity
